name: Ghosts CAN'T Go on Dates (and shouldn't)
name_original: Ghosts CAN'T Go on Dates (and shouldn't)
description:
GHOSTS. CAN. NOT. GO. ON. DATES. And they should feel bad for trying. They're just too different from humans to fit in. I mean, they don't eat. They don't drink. Hell, they don't even breath. Good riddance.

Your mission? Well... You have to help our Ghost friend go on a date. It'll take some trickery, subterfuge, and perhaps even a bit of bamboozlement to get your way through a date with the girl of your dreams.  It will be tough; after all, it's pretty obvious you're a ghost. It's up to you to fit in as a normal boyfriend and fake your way through this date!

Controls:
Space - breath
E - Eat
D - Drink

This is a submission for the Halloween Game Jam 2021
Theme: Ghosts doing normal human things
